nodes.text: Sedratis Coliseum was a sporting arena in Sedratis City. Madrix Hansor led his gladiator walker team, Hansor's Hooligans, to Sedratis City and took up residence in the building. They issued a challenge to the local gladiator walker team, Demelza's Destructors to remove them. Automated ticketing systems were swamped by demands from fans with tickets starting at 500 credits each.
